definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
dialectal or obsolete equivalent of 媽|妈[ma1]/Taiwan pr. [ma1]

sentences.english: To support the children, Granny gets up early every day to work on her farm.
sentences.chinese: 爲了扶養孫兒，阿嬤每天一大早起牀到農場工作。

sentences.english: When I have lunch near my office, I often bump into an old old grandma.
sentences.chinese: 我常常中午在公司附近喫飯的時候，會遇見一位阿嬤。

definition: master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]

Sun Tzu, also known as Sun Wu 孫武|孙武[Sun1 Wu3] (c. 500 BC, dates of birth and death uncertain), general, strategist and philosopher of the Spring and Autumn Period (700-475 BC), believed to be the author of the “Art of War” 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
Pingtung city, county and military airbase in south Taiwan
